clinical_history: Thyroid swelling and suspected nodular disease.
findings: Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 16.22 bpm.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Left kidney shows well-defined, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Soft tissue region demonstrates mildly thickened without fluid collection.
Common bile duct measures 27.95 mm, within normal limits.
Uterus appears smooth-walled; endometrial thickness measures 34.76 mm.
Gallbladder shows mildly heterogeneous, no stones or wall thickening.
recommendations: MRI or CT correlation may be helpful.
